title: Stunning Diamond and Emerald Grand Haaram
materials: High-quality Diamonds (9.93 carat total diamond weight; 951 individual stones in the necklace and 2.25 carat total diamond weight; 196 stones only in the locket)
Natural Rubies (4.15 carat total weight; 4 stones in the necklace and 2.45 carat total weight; 3 stones only in the locket)
Emeralds (2.85 carat total weight; 2 stones in the necklace and 1.56 carat total weight; 1 stone only in the locket). Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This exquisite Grand Haaram features a layered design with intricate diamond-studded floral motifs. The centerpiece consists of a large, circular pendant and drop-down locket each featuring a vibrant green emerald surrounded by a halo of sparkling diamonds. The necklace includes dangling gold beads adding movement and dimension. The piece exhibits detailed filigree work giving it a classic appeal with a modern twist. The setting is meticulously done to ensure maximum brilliance and durability.
colors: Predominantly gold and white (diamonds) with pops of vibrant green from the emeralds and red from the rubies.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for Seemantham or a Half-Saree function.
description: This Grand Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of premium quality diamonds, rubies, and emeralds set in 18K gold makes it a valuable investment. Its intricate design and traditional elements reflect South Indian heritage, making it a cherished heirloom. The meticulous attention to detail and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability.
